title: Interpretation of seeing travel in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing travel in a dream for a single woman: I see a free girl. A trip indicates a desire to get rid of daily habits or boring routines, to do a good job. But if she sees in her dream that she is preparing to travel, this is evidence of the existence of a relationship through a man in her life that she knows. In addition to a trip Single women who feel cheerful and happy, this is evidence of marriage in a short period of time. I mean a trip. For a single girl, she is confident in herself, likes to make the right decisions and has a very strong personality. Seeing her traveling by train in a dream is a sign of good and praiseworthy visions And a transition to a better and positive stage. But if she sees herself traveling through time in a dream, this is evidence of escaping and getting rid of problems in her life. Also, if she sees herself traveling on foot, this is evidence that she is heading towards the right, correct path, but she will face some difficulties and problems. Traveling alone in a dream by plane is evidence of the fulfillment of wishes and desires, and when he sees a passport, this is a sign of travel and his date is approaching. Seeing the only girl he loves at an airport in a dream, this indicates a positive change in her life for better things. As for traveling by car, in a dream of an unmarried girl, this indicates a status High and wonderful enjoyment. Interpretation of a dream about traveling abroad in a dream. Seeing more Traveling abroad from a dream is evidence of achieving goals, dreams and aspirations for the purpose of work or taking a trip and moving to another, better place. Traveling abroad indicates a change in reality for the dreamer for the better. If he sees many trips in a dream, this Evidence that he has very many dreams. Interpretation of a dream about traveling by plane in a dream: Traveling by plane indicates closeness to the Creator and answering prayers to the pioneer. Seeing a plane trip in a dream indicates achieving a high and great status, and advancement among people in the field of work. Traveling by plane is evidence of the fulfillment of the fortuneteller’s desires, Whoever wants success and therefore strives for it. Seeing oneself traveling in a small plane in a dream is evidence of success and achieving many of them, and achieving the success and excellence that one wanted. Dreaming about being afraid of riding a plane indicates a lot of anxiety and problems that affect the psychological state. Fear and anxiety of Riding a plane in a dream is evidence of the many problems and crises that the dreamer is going through at this stage. Flying a plane in a dream by traveling on it means that the dreamer has many responsibilities and many people around him depend on him. Interpretation of a dream about a trip for someone you love: The dream indicates excessive thinking and constant preoccupation with this person. Especially his affairs in life. The vision shows the dreamer’s high and wonderful ambition and his bright future. I am watching a trip in a dream, it indicates moving to a better period of life and you will likely move to another place. But if you see in a dream a trip of a loved one, this is evidence of intense love and attachment to him A traveler and we cry for the traveler. The vision shows the traveler crying. The dreamer wants to get rid of difficulties.

title: Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream about prayer for an unmarried woman

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of praying for an unmarried woman and the meaning of this dream in detail. Prayer is a way to get closer to God and strengthen the connection between the servant and his Lord. It erases a Muslim’s sins and increases his good deeds. It is also an important factor in his safety and the improvement of his circumstances. Because it prevents obscenity and evil, and it is also one of the reasons for entering Paradise, and seeing prayer in a dream indicates to the dreamer that something indicates goodness or food, but in the encyclopedia we will reveal to you what happens. This dream means, according to Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi’s interpretation of this vision. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of prayer for an unmarried woman. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of prayer in an unmarried woman’s dream as one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate the end of worries and the approach of comfort. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is praying among a group This vision is an indication of the approaching date of marriage, and God knows best, in the event that she performs the obligatory prayer. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is supplicating in prayer, this is a vision that bodes well, and indicates the ease of her circumstances and the imminent date of her marriage. Seeing istikharah in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates On a change in circumstances and change for the better. Seeing single people praying at home is good news for their strength and the removal of their worries. As for the duration of prayer in the mosque, it indicates engagement, whether it is engagement or marriage, in the case of the actually engaged woman. If an unmarried woman sees that she has not prayed a complete prayer Because someone cut off her prayer, this vision indicates that someone who is not suitable for her proposes to her. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a single woman. As for Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, it did not differ much from Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. It was reported that if an unmarried woman dreams that she is performing the obligatory prayer, then this vision It indicates marriage in a short time, and God knows best. If she prays on time, then this vision indicates that there will be problems in her life. Ibn Sirin also showed that if an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is performing only half of the prayer, then this vision symbolizes To her negligence in obeying God. Seeing them praying in the opposite direction of the Qiblah is an unpleasant vision for an unmarried woman, and indicates that she is committing sins and disobedience, and expects her to be in temptation. Interpretation of the evening prayer in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the evening prayer in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the satisfaction of desires and the removal of worries. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is praying, but in the opposite direction of the Qiblah, then this vision shows her distraction and her inability to make the right decisions in reality. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is performing the evening prayer with the worshipers, then this vision symbolizes her good morals and her closeness to God. We present to you The most prominent interpretations of seeing prayer in a dream. At the end of this article, we would like to note that all of these presented interpretations represent the jurisprudence of Sharia interpretations and it is not possible to confirm their fulfillment in reality. In all cases, only God knows the unseen, and to interpret another dream, you can download the instant dream interpretation application.

Nabulsi's interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a single woman As for Nabulsi's interpretation, it did not differ much from Ibn Sirin's interpretation It has been reported that if an unmarried woman dreams that she is performing the obligatory prayer, this vision indicates marriage in a short time, and God knows best. Seeing them praying in the opposite direction of the qiblah is a hateful vision for an unmarried woman, and an indication that she is committing sins and disobedience, and expecting her to be in temptations. Interpretation of the Isha prayer in a dream for a single woman Seeing the Isha prayer in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the satisfaction of desires and the removal of worries. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is praying, but in the opposite direction of the qiblah, this vision shows her distraction and inability to make the right decisions in reality. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is performing the Isha prayer with the worshipers, this vision symbolizes her good morals and closeness to God. We present to you the most prominent interpretations of seeing prayer in a dream, and at the end of this article we would like to note that all these interpretations presented represent the jurisprudence of interpretations Legitimacy and its realization on the ground cannot be confirmed. In any case, only God knows the unseen, and to interpret another dream you can download the instant dream interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of seeing my son’s birthday in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my son’s birthday in a dream: seeing a parent on the occasion of his young son’s birthday in a dream, and the son was in a state of sadness, is one of the unhappy dreams. It speaks of this son’s illness, which causes sadness for all family members. A dream about the birth of a young son, and he was in a state of sadness, is interpreted as It is a loss of money or the loss of a close friend due to his absence from him. When a married woman sees her son’s birthday in a dream, it promises her that she will hear good news related to this son and that he will excel in his field of study in the near future, God willing. Seeing a son’s birthday in a dream means noon. The son in a beautiful image, this dream portends the righteousness of the son and the amount of goodness he will enjoy in his professional life. Interpretation of birthday cake for individualsBirthday cake symbolizes: In a dream, she will be blessed with good luck in the next stage of her life. And the emergence of more positive things will please her heart. Seeing a birthday cake In a dream, it symbolizes the celebration that heralds the approaching engagement or marriage of her. If she is engaged, then soon, God willing. The dream of a Christmas cake indicates a blessing in the diet and comfort after sadness. Interpretation of a dream about eating Christmas sweets: Eating Christmas sweets in a dream and delicious in taste, it indicates To facilitate the situation, stabilize things, and achieve what he dreams about in his real life in the coming period. Seeing a dream eating Christmas sweets if the dreamer is in one of the educational stages. This explains the student’s success and excellence in all the tests he takes. For a person suffering from poverty, This dream promises him that he will obtain a source of livelihood through which he will obtain large sums of money, which will be an occasion to change the situation for the better. A man who is rich in money, when he sees this dream, promises him to obtain more profitable deals in his trade or field of work. Some scholars have interpreted it, such as Ibn Sirin, as he promised the patient a recovery from his illness from which he had suffered for some time. Interpretation of the birthday of the dead in a dream Quote from Ibn Sirin in the interpretation of the vision Celebrating the birthday of a dead person in reality. He was in a state of joy, and he was happy to tell about the condition of this dead man in the afterlife. And the bliss he attains, and his freedom from torment because of his good deeds in this world. It also indicates an easing of the situation, the emergence of everything good in the dreamer’s life and the expectation of more stability in his professional life. Seeing a celebration of the birthday of the dead, and the dead person was happy and dancing because of this celebration. He was one of those Known for their bad character, which indicates that things conflict with their natural course in the dreamer’s life due to injustice or committing sins. Interpretation of a dream about a Christmas gift: Accepting a gift in a dream symbolizes the difficulties and challenges that the dreamer faces in the current period of his real life. When he goes to celebrate the birthday of one of his relatives, And giving him a gift, says that one of the problems will happen to the person to whom he gave a gift. Sending an invitation letter to celebrate a birthday from a friend in a dream. Show between the monarch and this person enmity and animosity. Most of the sayings say in the interpretation

title: Interpretation of dreams about fishing: Seeing fish in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of an unmarried, married, pregnant, or divorced girl fishing by hand, hook, or net from the sea or lake, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. Interpretation of fishing in a dream. Interpretation scholars interpreted the vision of catching a fish in a dream, if it is a dead fish, as an indication that the dreamer has desires, some of which are fulfilled and some of which are known. It has not been fulfilled. Whoever dreams that he catches a live fish and eats it while it is alive, he will gain eminence and power, and whoever sees that he is eating salted fish, the dreamer will fall into distress. Whoever sees that he is looking at fried fish, this indicates that his prayer will be answered. Whoever sees that there are a lot of fish in the market before him And he bought a fish, then this indicates that he will buy a slave, and if the fish is in a place other than the market or unknown, and he buys a fish, then he will get married. Whoever sees that he is eating a rotten, rotten fish and leaves good food and fresh fish, then this indicates that the dreamer will come to A forbidden woman and he leaves the legal marriage. Whoever sees that he is asking for a fish or a whale and cannot get them, the dream indicates that he will condemn the person and deny his money and his rights. Whoever sees that he is looking at the lake or sea and finds inside a large whale that opens its mouth in one direction, the dreamer will be imprisoned. Whoever sees that he opens the fish and takes out a pearl or two, then he will gain money from his wife, or give birth to a son or twins from her, and they will be just and good. Whoever dreams that he looks and sees a dead fish in the sea, this is a bad omen and a hope that will not be fulfilled. Whoever sees a fish in a dream and is able Knowing its number indicates women, and if he sees a fresh, live fish, it indicates a maid, and if he sees it and does not know its number, it indicates money and spoils, and if he sees a whale surrounded by fish, then the whale indicates a minister and the fish indicates soldiers. And whoever sees that he catches a large fish, He showed helpfulness and kindness, and whoever sees that he is catching a soft fish without scales, this is evidence that the dreamer is making money by deceiving people. Whoever sees in a dream the fish and its color is brown, and the dreamer is about to get married, this indicates the dreamer’s kindness. Every sick person or traveler at sea and dreams With a fish in his bed indicates the evil that will befall him, and whoever dreams that he is fishing from turbid, polluted water indicates sadness and extreme anxiety. Whoever dreams that a fish comes out of his mouth, the dream indicates that he is speaking about a woman in her honor, words that cannot be dropped, and that he is persecuting her. In his jaws. And whoever dreams of catching fish from land or land, this indicates that he has committed immorality and indecency. Another interpretation of the symbol of fishing in a dream is that seeing fish in a dream can indicate goodness, benefit, and obtaining abundant money from the work that the person obtains from the work that he achieves in his life. Seeing fishing in a dream Seeing him fishing in a dream means that he reaches and satisfies his desires and reaches his goal and purpose in life. Fish in a dream is good news for married people, single people, males, children and all individuals. It can mean marriage and pregnancy in the near future and obtaining benefit and signifying goodness and living in life. A big fish in a dream. A big fish in a dream, it may mean that he gets rid of

Another interpretation of the symbol of fishing in a dream Seeing fish in a dream can indicate goodness, benefit, and obtaining abundant money from the work that a person obtains from the work he achieves in his life. Seeing fishing in a dream Seeing him fishing in a dream means that he reaches and satisfies his desires and reaches his goal and goal in life. Fish in a dream is good news for married people, singles, males, children, and all individuals. It can mean marriage and pregnancy in the near future and obtaining benefit and an indication of goodness and living in life. title: Interpretation of a dream about green plants

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about green plants: Green is one of the most beautiful colors that gives comfort and tranquility to the soul, and seeing natural plants and trees is one of the things that people love to see and enjoy, and planting green is beneficial to all living things. One could see green cultivation in his sleep as well. He is wondering about the interpretation of this dream, so we will present it to you through a different website. Interpretation of a dream about green plants. What is the interpretation of a dream about green plants in a dream? The great interpreters have provided many meanings and indications for seeing a green plant in a dream, and Imam Ibn Sirin says that planting in a dream is a good and praiseworthy vision; Because it is evidence of goodness, living, and a lot of money, and this dream is also linked to happy circumstances and good news for the owner. The dream, as Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of planting in a married man’s dream, is his desire to strengthen his children’s relationship with God Almighty. In the opinion of Ibn Sirin, a single young man is evidence of marriage to a girl with good morals and religion, and the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream for a married woman who has not given birth is that it heralds the approaching pregnancy, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about green plants for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees that she is planting vegetables and fruits in the garden and she is happy This is evidence that good things come their way and a lot of food. A green plant in a dream for a single woman with a beautiful appearance indicates success in her life, excellence, and the fulfillment of her dreams and aspirations. This vision for a single woman is a sign that she will soon marry someone with whom she will live a happy life. And if an unmarried girl sees herself planting Seedlings in a barren land, this indicates that the dreamer is committing disobedience and angering God Almighty. Interpretation of planting olives in a woman’s dream is evidence of the blessing of money. Seeing green plants in a married woman’s dream: A married woman who sees green plants in her house and then steals shows that her effort is wasted on something, such as watering the plants. In her sleep and giving birth to many children, this is good news for her to teach her children the principles of the true religion. The burning seed shows a married woman the misfortunes that she will go through in her real life. To dream of damaged plants means that he has bad morals. To see a beautiful green planting in her dream indicates the fulfillment of her dreams and the achievement of her goals. Interpretation of a dream Green plants for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees herself planting green plants in her dream and in her home garden, this is evidence that she will fulfill her dreams and fulfill her ambitions. Green plants in a dream carry the meaning of joy and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about a green plant in a dream about a pregnant woman is evidence of the ease of her birth and the end of fatigue. Seeing beautiful green plants for a pregnant woman symbolizes that she will acquire great wealth and money. If a pregnant woman dreams of green plants, the dream indicates that she will give birth to a beautiful male child, who will have a great relationship in the future and a prominent position, God willing. The meaning of the dream in a pregnant woman’s dream is that she lives A stable life with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about green plants in a solution

title: I dreamed that I was in a different house than my own

preview.html: Therefore, we will explain seeing a dream that I was in a house different from my own through a translation site, the largest dream interpretation site in the world, so please follow us. I dreamed that I was in a house different from my own in a dream about a girl. Seeing an unmarried girl promises that she is in a house different from Her house in a dream. Cue the approaching date of her wedding and moving to her husband’s house, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is in a house different from hers, she sees that the house is old. This indicates that she will marry a simple man who does not have a lot of money. Where is the lack of financial capabilities, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a house other than her own, in which there is a strange man whom she does not know. This indicates that she will be exposed to some problems and worries in the coming days, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means that she is in a house different from her own. With a man she does not know, but he is handsome and smiling. This indicates that she will marry a righteous man with good morals, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams about entering the house of the beloved for a single woman. I dreamed that I was in a house other than my own in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman in her dream means that she is in a house Change her home. Many changes have occurred in this woman’s life, making her better off than her, and God knows best. When a married woman dreams that she is in a house other than her home, but it is old. This may indicate that she will be exposed to some problems and fatigue. And her financial difficulties in her future, her job, her husband, and God. I know. But if she sees that she is in a house other than her own, and she is unable to leave it. This indicates that she will go through some financial difficulties and many ordeals, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a stranger, she does not know and sees that it is a new house. This is an indication to her that The situation will change, and it will be in the interest of everyone in the house, and it will be very soon, God willing. Likewise, when a married woman sees in her dream that she is in a house she does not know, and is spraying water all over the house. This indicates that she will face some problems and painful accidents that will cause... It has problems, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was in a house different from mine in a dream about a man and its meaning. When a man sees in his dream that he is sitting in a house other than his own, and he sees that house is large and spacious. This indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of goodness in the coming days, God willing. Whether the house is uncomfortable and cramped. This indicates that he may be exposed to some crises, financial difficulties, and hardships during this period, and God knows best. If a person sees in a dream that he is sitting in a house other than his own, and that this house is far from buildings, homes, and residents. This indicates That man’s misbehavior and his shameful misbehavior that no one will accept, and God knows best. When a man sees in his dream that he is sitting in a house other than his own, he sprinkles water on the house. This is a sign that he will be exposed to some of the many worries, worries, and crises in his life, and God knows best. As for the case of his vision He is in a house that he does not know and cannot leave. This indicates that he will achieve goodness and may receive blessings from H

title: Interpretation of seeing snake or snake meat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing snake or snake meat in a dream: People suffer from many visions and dreams that cause them panic or joy, according to what they see in the dream. Because many people are worried about dreams, they resort to trying to understand this vision, dreams and interpretations, including our article entitled Interpretation of a dream about eating a snake or snake in a dream to clarify some things. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of seeing eating snake or snake meat in a dream Interpretation of seeing eating snake meat or Snake in a dreamThe dream is interpreted based on the psychological state of the dreamer and what it indicates, but this is often interpreted as an upcoming livelihood - God willing - and here are some of them: Seeing a snake cooking and eating it indicates strength, durability, and the fulfillment of desired desires. Seeing yourself eating a snake or A snake in a dream means that you are taking forbidden money to the fortuneteller, such as orphan money, stolen or questionable money. If you see a snake eating soup, this is a sign of successful ventures, earning a living, and many good things. Ibn Sirin interpreted eating a lot of snake meat as An indication of the many sins committed by a person. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating a snake for one girl. Interpreters unanimously agree on some matters related to the interpretation of the dream about eating a snake in a dream, which is the upcoming diet or the large number of sins committed by the dreamer, such as: Seeing A snake eating in a dream means that you will achieve the dreams and goals that the girl wants. And if you dream that you are eating the head of a snake, this is a sign that he will enter a new phase full of goodness and happiness and emerge from a phase that almost destroyed his soul, which is worry, worry, and stability. And when you see her eating the skin of a snake, this indicates that The girl has many sins and a bad personality. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating snake meat in a dream for a married woman. Although interpreters agree on the meaning of the snake, eating it in a dream is good for bringing livelihood. It varies according to the viewer. Let us find some interpretations for a married woman, such as seeing a married woman eating a snake. It is a sign of stability with her husband, good news and peace of mind. If you see her eating a boiled snake in a dream, this is a sign of nourishment, future kindness and hard work. In the case of snakes that she catches, folds and eats, this is a sign of tireless striving and imminent goodness. See also: Holding a hand A friend in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating a snake or a snake in a dream for a pregnant woman. Any visions may prompt some to seek their interpretation and others to ignore and forget them, but when you see a snake in a dream you will not forget this vision, especially if the woman is pregnant. Seeing her eating a boiled snake is a happy thing. It indicates the suffering that a pregnant woman will endure. Or an indication of the elephant disease that afflicted her. Or if she is sick, it indicates the complete elimination of the disease. If she catches and eats a snake in a dream, this is a sign that God will bless her with a wonderful child.

Interpretation of a dream about eating snake meat in a dream for a married woman. Although interpreters agree on the meaning of the snake, eating it in a dream is good for bringing livelihood. It varies according to the viewer. Let us find some interpretations for a married woman, such as seeing a married woman eating a snake. It is a sign of stability with her husband, good news and peace of mind. If you see her eating a boiled snake in a dream, this is a sign of nourishment, future kindness and hard work. In the case of snakes that she catches, folds and eats, this is a sign of tireless striving and imminent goodness. See also: Holding a hand A friend in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating a snake or a snake in a dream for a pregnant woman. Any visions may prompt some to seek their interpretation and others to ignore and forget them, but when you see a snake in a dream you will not forget this vision, especially if the woman is pregnant. Seeing her eating a boiled snake is a happy thing. It indicates the suffering that a pregnant woman will endure. Or an indication of the elephant disease that afflicted her. Or if she is sick, it indicates the complete elimination of the disease. If she catches and eats a snake in a dream, this is a sign that God will bless her with a wonderful child.
